mapper.select: SELECT B.BUS_NO ,B.BUS_NAME ,B.BUS_PHONE ,B.BUS_ADDR ,S.SVC_CD FROM BUSINESS_TB B INNER JOIN SERVICE_TB S ON B.BUS_NO = S.BUS_NO WHERE S.SVC_CD = #{svcCd}
SELECT B.BUS_NO ,B.BUS_NAME ,B.BUS_PHONE ,B.BUS_ADDR ,H.TAG_CONTENT FROM BUSINESS_TB B INNER JOIN HASHTAG_TB H ON B.BUS_NO = H.BUS_NO WHERE H.TAG_CONTENT = #{hashTag}

SELECT B.BUS_NO ,B.BUS_NAME ,B.BUS_PHONE ,B.BUS_ADDR ,S.SVC_CD ,H.TAG_CONTENT FROM BUSINESS_TB B INNER JOIN SERVICE_TB S ON B.BUS_NO = S.BUS_NO INNER JOIN HASHTAG_TB H ON B.BUS_NO = H.BUS_NO WHERE S.SVC_CD = #{svcCd} AND H.TAG_CONTENT = #{hashTag}
